#include<stdio.h>

int main()
{ int t,c1,c2,c3,n,n1,n2,n3;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    
    while(t--)
    { c1=c2=c3=0;
              scanf("%d",&n);
              n1=n2=n3=n;
              while(n1)
              {
                      c1+=n1/2;
                      n1/=2;
                      }
                       while(n2)
              {
                      c2+=n2/3;
                      n2/=3;
                      }
                      
                     
                      while(n3)
              {
                      c3+=n3/5;
                      n3/=5;
                      }
                      
                      printf("%d\n%d\n%d\n",c1,c2,c3);
                      }
                      return 0;
                      }
